title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Social Science Decision-Making Competency Enhancement Project: Language Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three-stage social science decision-making framework (problem definition → strategy development → reflective evaluation) to solve language-related practical problems.
Learners can enhance their decision-making ability to assess the validity of language policies through evidence-based reasoning and social interaction.
Learners can systematically analyze complex problems in the language domain based on scientific knowledge and epistemic beliefs.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
